item.title:
2022 年，俄罗斯摧毁了半个马里乌波尔。现在，莫斯科想表明它正在重建这座乌克兰城市。
但现实情况却大相径庭。居民们住在危险的半成品房屋中，而俄罗斯公司却从价值数百万美元的合同中获利。
item.description:
In 2022 Russia destroyed half of Mariupol. Now Moscow wants to show it is rebuilding the Ukrainian city.

But the reality is very different. Residents live in dangerous, half-built homes while Russian companies profit from contracts worth millions.

ig.ft.com/mariupol/?segmenti…

item.title:
RT by @FT：新消息：战争开始以来加沙建筑受损情况动画。以色列国防军可能损坏了加沙地带 50%以上的建筑物。非常感谢 @coreymaps 和 @JamonVDH 提供数据
阅读 @MehulAtLarge、@hebamks 和 Mai Khaled 的报告
#dataviz
item.description:
NEW: Animation of building damage in Gaza since the war began. The IDF have likely damaged more than 50% of buildings in the strip. Huge thanks to @coreymaps & @JamonVDH for supplying the data

Read @MehulAtLarge, @hebamks and Mai Khaled's report
ft.com/content/6265f18b-3fba…
#dataviz
